title: 'Stuff The Bus' And Support Local Schools At Manahawkin Applebee's
description: Bring school supplies to the Applebee's in Manahawkin and support children in three local school districts.
content:
MANAHAWKIN, NJ — As summer comes to an end and the new school year is set to begin, you can help kids get off to a strong start by donating school supplies at the Doherty-owned Applebee's Restaurants' annual "Stuff the Bus" school supply drive. Again in 2025, the Manahawkin location will be participating.

Each year, participating locations turn their parking lots into donation hubs by parking a bright yellow school bus outside the restaurant. By donating school supplies or cash contributions, guests can help "stuff the bus" and support local school districts. All collected items and funds will be loaded directly onto the bus and delivered to three local school districts helping students start the school year off right with the supplies they need to succeed.

“Giving back to our neighborhoods stands tall as a pillar of our company’s mission,” said Tim Doherty, President of Doherty Enterprises. “Our annual Stuff the Bus campaign has become a late summer tradition we look forward to as another school year approaches. It’s amazing to see the generosity of our guests and how many local students benefit from their kindness.” Guests and community members are encouraged to drop off donations during their next Applebee’s visit. Last year’s effort raised more than $33,000 worth of supplies and donations for local schools.
summary: The Doherty-owned Applebee's Restaurants are hosting their annual "Stuff the Bus" school supply drive, which involves guests parking a school bus outside the restaurant. The donations will be transported to three local school districts. The campaign has raised over $33,000 for local schools.
shortSummary: Applebee's in Manahawkin is hosting the annual "Stuff the Bus" campaign, allowing guests to donate school supplies and support local schools.
argos_summary: The Doherty-owned Applebee's Restaurants in Manahawkin, NJ, is hosting its annual "Stuff the Bus" school supply drive to support local students as the new school year begins. Guests can donate school supplies or cash contributions, which will be collected in a yellow school bus parked outside the restaurant and delivered to three local school districts. The campaign, which has become a summer tradition, aims to help students start the school year with the necessary supplies, having raised over $33,000 in the previous year.
